rows.label: qev031301_MSG0001
rows.name:
I have learned much about Earth aliens.
Your potential frightens me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0002
rows.name: How is your kind so adept at war?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0010
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that it's the product of centuries of fighting.

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0020
rows.name: Disagree

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0021
rows.name: Say that the Prone would defeat humans in a war.

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0003
rows.name: Knowledge? Experience? These are your weapons?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0004
rows.name:
Tree Clan fought Cavern Clan for 10,000 suns.
Yet we never developed science of war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0005
rows.name: But your kind...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0006
rows.name:
In only few thousand suns, Earth aliens made many
geniuses of war. Men like Sun Tzu. Like Clausewitz.
You took their thoughts. Refined them. Used them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0007
rows.name:
War between our people would be over in days.
It would be end of all Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0008
rows.name:
This pleases me to hear. But it is wrong.
Earth aliens would defeat Prone in matter of days.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0009
rows.name:
Not because you are stronger. Or have advanced
weaponry. But because you understand science of war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0010
rows.name: Have you read works of Sun Tzu? Or Clausewitz?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0011
rows.name:
Tree Clan fought Cavern Clan for 10,000 suns.
Yet never did we have such thinkers in art of war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0012
rows.name:
I will study Earth-alien writings here in New LA.
I will become strategist. Lead Prone to great victories![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0013
rows.name:
Age of warfare through brute force is over.
Age of warfare through strategy has come.
Now Cavern Clan and Ganglion will finally fall to us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0014
rows.name:
Strategy? Writing? Earth aliens stronger than Prone?
Gya ha ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0015
rows.name:
I always thought you were fool, Sajif. Now I know.
Your strength is nothing compared to mine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0016
rows.name:
True, Vio Penga. You have strength of gorida.
I could train my whole life and never match it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0017
rows.name:
I have killed many Cavern Clan in battle!
You do nothing but talk.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0018
rows.name: But now that I learn strategy, I—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0019
rows.name:
You! Earth alien! Do you really think your puny kind
could defeat mighty Prone?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0031
rows.name:
Declare that humans would most
certainly defeat the mighty Prone.

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0040
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0041
rows.name: Admit that puny humans would likely lose to the Prone.

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0020
rows.name:
Gya ha ha ha! This one makes me laugh!
Such courage is good.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0021
rows.name:
But we would never lose. Not to your kind.
"Strategy" is useless against strength of Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0022
rows.name:
Gya ha ha ha! This one is honest!
Do not worry, little Earth alien.
We have no plans to war with your kind.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0023
rows.name:
But if we did, you would lose. No "strategy" can stand
against strength of Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0024
rows.name:
Stop wasting time with books, Sajif. Train instead.
You are tiny and frail as fennerc![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0025
rows.name:
Enough! I am no weakling to be mocked.
I will claim fortress and prove my strength.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0026
rows.name:
And I will use strategy I have read about...
Strategy of assassination![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0027
rows.name:
Killing top of enemy chain causes forces to wither.
Lets them be defeated by smaller numbers.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0028
rows.name:
Help me, Earth alien. Go forth and assassinate
Secretary Kentaro Nagi, leader of New LA's forces.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0029
rows.name:
Then I will take control of city and prove worth of
Earth-alien strategy. Will you do this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0050
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0051
rows.name: Nod grimly and prepare for war.

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0060
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0061
rows.name: Tell Sajif that he's talking crazy talk.

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0030
rows.name:
You are bigger fool than Sajif. Why do this?
Your own people will suffer![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0031
rows.name:
Rrrgh... This is...true. I am shamed.
I have lived to see day where Vio Penga corrects me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0032
rows.name:
I see. This would cause trouble for your kind.
And you have done much for us already.
I apologize for suggestion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0033
rows.name:
I have other idea. Ganglion are building new
stronghold. Go to Lotus Keep building site and
kill leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0034
rows.name:
We will topple fortress before it ever stands.
And you will be paid, of course.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0035
rows.name:
You will be modern-day Sun Tzu!
But be certain to slay only leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0036
rows.name:
Killing others would be brute force.
Make us no better than Vio Penga.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0037
rows.name:
Even on way back, strike down only leader.
Prove human strategy superior.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0042
rows.name:
Lotus Keep building site is in Noctilum.
On way in and way out, do NOT fight underlings.
Assassinate only leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0043
rows.name:
This will prove power of Earth-alien strategy.
Allow me to share it with fellow Prone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0044
rows.name:
Then Cavern Clan will be threat no longer.
Keen mind will see war brought to swift end![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0045
rows.name:
Greetings, [ST:playername ]!
You did perfect job of killing only leader.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0046
rows.name:
They were powerless as beast without head.
Handful of Prone just brought fortress down![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0047
rows.name:
Strategy was great success! It stands as proof that
Prone can fight with more than muscle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0048
rows.name:
What did you think of my plan?
Do I have talent for this...strategy?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0070
rows.name: Praise

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0071
rows.name: Tell Sajif that his plan was brilliant.

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0080
rows.name: Censure

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0081
rows.name: Tell Sajif that his plan was a coward's trick.

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0049
rows.name:
Hearing those words from Earth alien means much.
I respect your kind greatly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0050
rows.name: ...Well, Vio? Do you still think strategy useless?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0051
rows.name: Hmph. You may be more Prone than me, Earth alien.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0052
rows.name: ...And you, Vio? Do you still think strategy useless?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0053
rows.name:
I admit it was...impressive. Force that small should
not have claimed fort so large.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0054
rows.name: Even if I fought with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0055
rows.name:
Then you agree Tree Clan must adopt strategy into our
fighting?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0056
rows.name: I do not like sneaky tricks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0057
rows.name:
But I like losing lives of clansmen less.
Your "strategy" will keep them safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0058
rows.name:
Yes, exactly! That is core of strategy.
To crush enemies while saving your own.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0059
rows.name:
Thank you, Earth alien. You have proven worth of
strategy. Helped me win support of clan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0060
rows.name:
I will reward you most generously.
For keeping strong allies paid is strategy as well![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0061
rows.name:
Shame, [ST:playername ].
You killed more than just leader. That is no better than
brute force tactics Vio clings to.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0062
rows.name:
Gya ha ha ha! [ST:gender p1=He p2=She ] was right to do so.
Prone have no need for cowardly "strategy."[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0063
rows.name:
Cut down all enemies who stand before you.
That is how war is fought! Earth alien proved it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0064
rows.name: B-but with proper strategy, even a few can conquer—[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0065
rows.name: Enough yapping, little fennerc![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0066
rows.name:
I was impressed by your strength, Earth alien.
I would test it myself one day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0090
rows.name: Accept

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0091
rows.name: Say that you'd love to spar with Vio.

rows.label: qev031301_JNK0100
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev031301_SEL0101
rows.name: Say that you have no interest in unnecessary fighting.

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0067
rows.name: You have more Prone pride than Sajif![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0068
rows.name:
...True. We are allies now. Sajif is fool,
but your keen mind is asset to both our kinds.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0069
rows.name:
You can cover my back in battle, Earth alien.
I will watch yours too.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0070
rows.name:
I can say nothing. As your writings claim,
history is written by victors.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev031301_MSG0071
rows.name:
Hmph. Take your pay. Next time, I will find warrior
I can trust. Their victory will prove power of strategy.[ST:wait ]
